definitions: an act of counting numerals in reverse order to zero, especially to time the last seconds before the launching of a rocket or missile

examples.text: the launch crews would begin their final countdown

shortDefinitions: act of counting numerals in reverse order to zero

definitions: the final moments before a significant event and the procedures carried out during this time

examples.text: it is hard to imagine the countdown to war continuing without an intensification of diplomacy

shortDefinitions: period of time leading up to significant event

definitions: a digital display that counts down

examples.text: a key toggles the countdown on and off
